name: Breach The Castle
description:
Game developed for KenneyJam Game Jam.  First Game Jam i've participated in, fell into the trap of over scoping the general game plan, however!  Still a fun challenge.  :)

The game is Capture the flag, send your knights over to your enemies castle in a timely manner a bring back their King!

No audio used in game.

[CONTROLS]

Q - Turn Camera Left

E - Turn Camera Right

Moving Mouse to edge of screen - Move Camera
